Sentencas: Apatite ceramics are interesting alternative solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) electrolytes because of their open structure for the transportation of oxide ions and their good chemical stability.
Titulo: Sinterability and conductivity of barium doped aluminium lanthanum oxyapatite La9.5Ba0.5Si5.5Al0.5O26.5 electrolyte of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This study reports the influence of barium doping on the microstructure, sinterability and oxide conductivity properties of the aluminium lanthanum oxyapatite La9.5Ba0.5Si5.5Al0.5O26.5.
Titulo: Sinterability and conductivity of barium doped aluminium lanthanum oxyapatite La9.5Ba0.5Si5.5Al0.5O26.5 electrolyte of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: SEM results show that lanthanum substitution with barium improves the sinterability of apatite ceramics.
Titulo: Sinterability and conductivity of barium doped aluminium lanthanum oxyapatite La9.5Ba0.5Si5.5Al0.5O26.5 electrolyte of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The barium doping also enhances the conductivity of the aluminium lanthanum silicates.
Titulo: Sinterability and conductivity of barium doped aluminium lanthanum oxyapatite La9.5Ba0.5Si5.5Al0.5O26.5 electrolyte of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The oxygen ion conductivity of La9.5Ba0.5Si5.5Al0.5O26.5 sintered at 1600 degrees C is 2.21 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Sinterability and conductivity of barium doped aluminium lanthanum oxyapatite La9.5Ba0.5Si5.5Al0.5O26.5 electrolyte of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: S cm(-1) at 800 degrees C, higher than 9.81 x 10(-3) S cm(-1) of La10Si5AlO26.5 sample prepared under the same conditions.
Titulo: Sinterability and conductivity of barium doped aluminium lanthanum oxyapatite La9.5Ba0.5Si5.5Al0.5O26.5 electrolyte of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results in the present study demonstrate that doping Ba on the La site for aluminium lanthanum oxyapatite reduces the sintering temperature and improves the ion conductivity.
Titulo: Sinterability and conductivity of barium doped aluminium lanthanum oxyapatite La9.5Ba0.5Si5.5Al0.5O26.5 electrolyte of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The enhancement of Ba dopant is mainly on the improvement of the densification and thus substantially reduced grain boundary resistance of aluminium lanthanum oxyapatite particularly at low temperatures (C) 2012
Titulo: Sinterability and conductivity of barium doped aluminium lanthanum oxyapatite La9.5Ba0.5Si5.5Al0.5O26.5 electrolyte of solid oxide fuel cells
